column3: but they are quite big - I quickly realized that one was enough for me. My only real complaint was that the meat needed to have some liquid drained off before putting it into the tortilla.  I enjoyed the chicken and the brisket
column4: then when I returned I had just the chicken again. There is a pork taco
column6: I'm currently not eating pork by choice. The meat has some great smoke on it
column7: and the condiments are ample. They pre-melt the cheese that goes on the chicken taco
column8: which makes it even better. The tortillas are made in house
column10: as well as the salsa and escabeche.  These are all things that make me happy.
